name: Gameboy Assets - Nova Blaster
description:
Includes:

  • Character with animations including
    • Idle
    • Run
    • Jump
    • Fall
    • Land
    • Clamber
    • And more!
  • Enemies with similar animations
  • Sprite effects
  • Tilesets with tile sizes of 8x8
    • Dirt
    • Brick
    • Water
    • and more!
  • Background assets, including still images, animated bird, etc.
  • Some miscellaneous objects/pickups
  • HUD elements (including fonts)
